Description: Details of changes to the duration, price, scope or other significant features of the contracting process
Mapping to OC4IDS:
For each variation, change or amendment, publish an entry with a ``.date`` and ``.description`` in ``.summary.modifications``.

Set ``.type`` based on the type of change and provide the relevant before/after values in ``.oldContractPeriod``, ``.oldContractValue``, ``.newContractPeriod and ``.newContractValue``.

Description: Documentation of one or more approved escalations of the contract price during the project lifecycle.
Mapping to OC4IDS:
.. markdown::
  [Add a contracting process document](#add-a-contracting-process-document) to ``.summary.documents`` and set ``.documentType`` to 'escalationApprovals'.

Description: Documentation identifying deficiencies in designs, specifications, standards, methods, procedures and practices, and identifying best practices.
Mapping to OC4IDS:
.. markdown::
  [Add a contracting process document](#add-a-contracting-process-document) to ``.summary.documents`` and set ``.documentType`` to 'qualityAssuranceReport'.

Description: A list of the spending transactions made against this contract and/or a document certifying that the work specified on a supplier's estimate or invoice is complete and that payment to the supplier is approved
Mapping to OC4IDS:
.. markdown::

  **Data:**

  For each disbursement, add a ``Transaction`` to ``.summary.transactions`` and set its fields according to the schema definitions.

  **Documents:**

  [Add a contracting process document](#add-a-contracting-process-document) to ``.summary.documents`` and set ``.documentType`` to 'paymentCertificate'.

Description: A legal document that changes or adds to the terms of an existing contract.
Mapping to OC4IDS:
.. markdown::
  [Add a contracting process document](#add-a-contracting-process-document) to ``.summary.documents`` and set ``.documentType`` to 'contractAmendment'.
